nu.nerd.entitymeta

Class MetadataTypeManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • nu.nerd.entitymeta.MetadataTypeManager

  • public class MetadataTypeManager
extends Object
    Manages the mapping from classes and type codes to MetadataType instances.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static MetadataTypeManager INSTANCE
      The single instance of this class.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addType(MetadataType type)
      Add a handler for a new type.
      Collection<MetadataType> getAllTypes()
      Return a collection of all supported metadata types.
      MetadataType getType(Object value)
      Return the MetadataType appropriate for serialising the specified value.
      MetadataType getTypeByClass(Class<?> clazz)
      Return the MetadataType appropriate for serialising values of the specified class.
      MetadataType getTypeByCode(char code)
      Return the MetadataType corresponding to the single character type code, or null if not found.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • INSTANCE

        public static final MetadataTypeManager INSTANCE
        The single instance of this class.

    • Method Detail

      • getType

        public MetadataType getType(Object value)
        Return the MetadataType appropriate for serialising the specified value.
        Parameters:
        value - the value to be serialised; must be non-null.
        Returns:
        the MetadataType appropriate for serialising the specified value.
        Throws:
        EntityMetadataException - if the value is of an unsupported type.

      • getTypeByClass

        public MetadataType getTypeByClass(Class<?> clazz)
        Return the MetadataType appropriate for serialising values of the specified class.
        Parameters:
        clazz - the class of values to be serialised.
        Returns:
        the MetadataType appropriate for serialising a value of that class.
        Throws:
        EntityMetadataException - if the class is an unsupported type.

      • getTypeByCode

        public MetadataType getTypeByCode(char code)
        Return the MetadataType corresponding to the single character type code, or null if not found.
        Parameters:
        code - the type code.
        Returns:
        the MetadataType corresponding to the single character type code, or null if not found.

      • getAllTypes

        public Collection<MetadataType> getAllTypes()
        Return a collection of all supported metadata types.
        Returns:
        a collection of all supported metadata types.

      • addType

        public void addType(MetadataType type)
        Add a handler for a new type.
        Parameters:
        type - handles serialisation and deserialisation of values of the Java class returned by MetadataType.getValueClass().
